publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-193 Cathy Jamieson: Vulnerable Witnesses (Scotland) Bill - Stage 1—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Vulnerable Witnesses (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Peter Peacock*, Hugh Henry*
